title: FS/FT: Large T207 Lot w/Many SP's - Priced Individually
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Large T207 Lot w/Many SP's - Priced Individually
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following group of T207's available.  Conditions vary and are shown in the scans.  I have priced the cards individually and all prices are delivered.  Payment via any method you prefer.  I would also gladly consider trades for any pre-war cards I need (no T205, T206, or T207).  I collect just about everything and no trades are too large or small.  Thanks for looking and please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve any cards or with any trade offers.

CARDS PICTURED:

Almeida SGC 10 - **TRADED**
Derrick PSA 1 - $20
Downey SGC A (one of the toughest cards in the set) - $225
